text: Damien Sayre Chazelle (born January 19, 1985) is an American movie director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known for his movies Whiplash (2014), La La Land (2016), First Man (2018) and Babylon (2022). He is the youngest director to win the Academy Award for Best Director at the age of 32. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:Writers from Providence, Rhode Island Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:BAFTA Award winning directors Category:Golden Globe Award winning directors
title: Damien Chazelle
